title: Old Client

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Is there a way to completely get rid of this? Its completely useless now as the new client has been retired. (this comes up when i type league of legends in the start menu search win8.1 and is the only result). Why does Riot not get rid of this?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
right click the  launcher that you use and then click on 'open file location'
 
scroll abit down then create shortcut for LeagueClient.exe

it has the new client image icon

that will start the new client straight away. (when you click on it obviously)

when you installed the new client it was supposed to create a new shortcut.

If you go to your LoL folder which is normally C:\Riot Games\League of Legends. You should find an Application file called "LeagueClient" which is what you should be using instead of the old "lol.launcher".

Right click the "league client" app and create a shortcut on your desktop. voila.

Another thing is LoL itself is only about 5gb big however everey time it patches it keeps everything and the redundant files so many peoples LoL folders are well over 15-20gb. So sometimes deleting the entire Riot Games folder and downloading a fresh copy can save you a tonne of space.
